name: KodakMonitorSkills
0:
”Alexa, turn on melody one on name”
”Alexa, what's the temperature on name”
”Alexa, turn off melody one on name”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
To start sending voice command to your Kodak Monitor via Alexa devices:
- You will need to setup your Kodak SmartHome account first. 
- Then add the Kodak Monitor to your account using the Kodak Smart Home Mobile app that is available on both Android and iOS platform. 
- Then link the Kodak Monitor account to your Alexa app.

Currently we support the following functions to be controlled on the monitor: 
- Check the current temperature reading on the monitor
- Turn off / turn off a specific lullaby: There are 5 lullabies on the monitor. 
- Enable Motion detection feature.
